competition_summary.context: competition in the financing market. PFS’s primary competitors include commercial banks and independent finance and leasing companies. 5 The revenue earned on loans and leases depends on market interest and lease rates and the ability of PFS to differentiate itself from the competition by superior industry knowledge and customer service. Dealer inventory loans have variable rates with rates reset monthly based on an index pertaining to the applicable local market. Retail loan and lease contracts
